title: Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite
content:
te to grow in power, it affects Omeluum as well, making him feel unsettled. This will give you the following dialogue options.

I felt it grow inside me. There's more power than ever. That potion of yours could have killed me. The tadpole almost did the same. You were supposed to make it weaker, not stronger!

Choosing dialogue 1 will reveal that Omeluum did not expect this outcome. This will give you the following dialogue options.

So I went through all this and the tadpole's still lodged in m
